resources.string: Success at anything will always come down to this: focus and effort. And we control both.\n\n - By Elon Musk
Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.\n\n -By Steve Jobs
You may not always have a comfortable life, and you will not always be able to solve all the problems at once, but do not ever underestimate the importance you can have.\n\n -By Michelle Obama
Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrows reality.\n\n - By Malala Yousafzai
